job.title: Machine Learning Engineer / $45 per hour DOE
job.description:
We have a client who is looking to bring on a Machine Learning Engineer to join their team. This company focuses on people and how they navigate their everyday lives from things like major purchases like buying a house, life changing events like going to college or starting a new business. They focus on making sure that the data their clients/consumers have before, during and after making these big decisions is delivered effectively and set them up for success.
Upon Joining The Team You Would Be
Working in close collaboration with data science and engineering teams
Analyzing structured and unstructured data sources to determine the key business questions and hypotheses that can be explored with the data sets
Evaluating approaches and algorithms based on available data and research objectives
Developing experimental ML Models to solve complex data mining problems
Required Skills & Experience
3+ years of experience
Degree in Computer Science or related
Python
Snowflake
SQL
AWS Sagemaker
Desired Skills & Experience
Independent Thinking
Must have an understanding of US Retail and Online Markets
What You Will Be Doing
Tech Breakdown
90% Machine Learning
10% Engineering
Daily Responsibilities
100% Hands On
The Offer
Competitive Salary: Up to $45/hour DOE
7 month contract-to-hire
You Will Receive The Following Benefits
Medical Insurance & Health Savings Account (HSA)
401(k)
Paid Sick Time Leave
Pre-tax Commuter Benefit
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.
Posted By:
Treasure Kimp
